root.select: SELECT sg.workarea_no, sg.group_no, sg.material, sg.material_type, sg.material_type_flange, sg.rating, sg.gc1, sg.vigorous_circulation, sg.corrosion_allowance, sg.status, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'pipe_no' AS pipe_no, sc.uid, sg.file_sheet_id, fs.name file_name, f.url, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'nominal_diameters' AS nominal_diameters, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'medium_discription' AS medium_discription, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'medium_phase' AS medium_phase, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'pipe_spec' AS pipe_spec, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'fluid_code' AS fluid_code, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'pipe_materials' AS pipe_materials, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'design_temp' AS design_temp, sc.pipe_naming_table :: JSON ->> 'design_press' AS design_press FROM select_group AS sg left JOIN select_condition AS sc ON sc.workarea_no = sg.workarea_no and sc.group_no = sg.group_no left join file_sheet fs on fs.id = sg.file_sheet_id left join file f on fs.file_no = f.file_no and f.workarea_no = sg.workarea_no WHERE sg.workarea_no = ?1 ORDER BY sg.group_no, sc.file_item_index
